Help:Node.title: Command Usage: recite
Help:Node.Log:Description:
COMMAND USAGE: recite [object]
EXAMPLE: recite scroll
{? equal | $(theatre.gameid) | Marrach |Reads out load the text written on an scrolls or books. You may also read out loud scrolls (but not books) with chant, cite, instruct, sing, and orate. |In some games you can recite scrolls or books out loud }
SEE ALSO: address, erase, sign, write, scroll
